column2: Position Overview:  We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior CSR Manager to lead and manage our CSR programs in Bhopal, India. The ideal candidate will have 5-10 years of proven experience in CSR management, with a strong track record of designing, implementing, and evaluating impactful CSR initiatives. Key Responsibilities: Develop and implement the company's CSR strategy in alignment with business goals and societal needs. Identify key areas for CSR intervention based on stakeholder engagement, community needs assessments, and sustainable development goals. Lead cross-functional teams to design and execute CSR projects focused on education, healthcare, environment, and community development. Establish and maintain partnerships with NGOs, government agencies, and other stakeholders to maximize the impact of CSR initiatives. Deep understanding of CSR principles, global sustainability frameworks, and ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) standards. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities with a focus on data-driven impact assessment. Excellent communication, negotiation, and relationship-building skills with internal and external stakeholders. Proficiency in project management tools, MS Office Suite, and CSR reporting platforms. Knowledge of local laws, regulations, and cultural contexts related to CSR in India, especially in the Bhopal region, is highly desirable. Passion for social impact, sustainability, and driving positive change in communities.
